title: Vegetable lasagne
ingredients: ['500g lasagne sheets', '450g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '100g chopped green pepper', '125g chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 (350g) jars pasta sauce', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '425g ricotta cheese', '450g grated mozzarella cheese', '2 eggs', '50g grated Parmesan cheese']
